WorkWell
The WorkWell application is designed to support and enhance ergonomic wellness through guided exercises and posture correction tools. However, it is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment to existing medical conditions. Login Welcome Back! Welcome Aboard! WorkWell is built to transform the way you care for your posture and well-being in a world that keeps you seated for hours. Whether you\'re working, gaming, or creating, our app is your companion in staying aligned, reducing discomfort, and fostering a healthier, more energized you. WorkWell envisions a world where posture care is seamlessly integrated into daily life, empowering individuals to maintain optimal alignment, reduce discomfort, and enhance overall well-being. We strive to create a future where technology and wellness converge. “Better Posture Less Strain.\nLive Healthier with WorkWell.” WorkWell is dedicated to fostering a culture of movement, mindfulness, and proactive well-being in an increasingly sedentary world. We believe that small, consistent changes in posture and daily habits can lead to significant improvements in comfort, productivity, and overall health. We are a team of dedicated and passionate individuals who came together to build WorkWell. Driven by curiosity and a desire to create meaningful solutions, we collaborated to develop an intuitive and user-friendly application. Through continuous learning and teamwork, we strive to make technology more accessible and helpful for everyone. “Thank you for choosing WorkWell. Here’s to smarter posture, better movement, and a more exciting work experience!” Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or feedback. Work comfortably! workwell@gmail.com
Log in to WorkWell app to access your personalized routines. It provides users with essential details about their daily exercise routine and personal information. The Routine Tab displays your assigned exercise. You can start current routine by tapping Start Routine, while past routines serve as a reference for progress tracking. You will see exercises included in your selected routine, each with a View Instructions button to check detailed steps before performing them. It provides a video guide, a reference link, and step-by-step instructions for performing the exercise and setting up your device. A disclaimer clarifies that WorkWell is a guidance tool, not a medical treatment. Tracks your completed routines, showing the routine name, date, and time of completion. You can tap See Details to review each session. This page includes you recorded video after the exercise, along with ratings for stiffness, pain, difficulty, and awareness. It also features a reflection section for personal notes and doctor’s comments with feedback on performance. It provides access to account details, information about the app, and a user guide. A log-out button is available at the bottom for easy sign-out. It provides a quick overview of the user\'s profile information. This page introduces WorkWell, explaining its purpose, vision, and brand statement. It also highlights the developers behind the app and provides contact information for inquiries. This section of the WorkWell app provides users with essential guidance on navigating the app and utilizing its features effectively.
By using WorkWell, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, you must discontinue using the Application. WorkWell is designed for posture monitoring and ergonomic enhancement through guided exercises, posture detection, and self-assessment. It is not a medical device and does not provide medical diagnoses, treatments, or professional health consultations. WorkWell users should be aged 18–64 years old. By using the Application, you confirm that you are within this age range and understand the limitations of the system. WorkWell is committed to protecting your privacy. The following outlines our data collection, usage, and security measures:
WorkWell collects the following data to enhance user experience:\n •Personal Information: Name, age, email address, and account details.\n •Health-Related Data: Self-reported posture awareness, pain intensity, exercise difficulty, and doctor-provided diagnosis and prescriptions.\n •Video and Image Data: Recorded exercise sessions for self-review and healthcare analysis.\n •Usage Data: App interactions, frequency of use, and session history.
Your data is used solely for the following purposes:\n •To track and improve posture and exercise progress.\n •To provide personalized recommendations based on self-assessments.\n •To facilitate analysis by healthcare professionals (if applicable).\n •To improve WorkWell’s performance and user experience.
Your personal data will not be sold or shared with third parties, except in the following cases:\n •With healthcare professionals (if you opt to share progress logs and assessments).\n •For legal compliance (if required by law or governmental authorities).\n •With service providers (for secure storage and maintenance of the Application).
We implement strong security measures to protect your data, including:\n •Encrypted storage of personal and health-related data.\n •Restricted access to authorized personnel only.\n •Secure cloud storage using Firebase and Cloudinary with role-based authentication.
By using WorkWell, you agree to:\n •Provide accurate information for personalized recommendations.\n •Follow the usage guidelines, including correct posture positioning and recommended camera setup.\n •Use the Application only for personal health tracking and improvement.\n •Ensure a safe environment while performing exercises to prevent injury.\n Users are prohibited from:\n •Sharing login credentials with others.\n •Misusing WorkWell’s features for unintended purposes.\n •Attempting to reverse-engineer, modify, or exploit the Application’s functionality.
WorkWell, including its software, trademarks, and content, is the intellectual property of WorkWell. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution is strictly prohibited.
WorkWell is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. The developers are not liable for:\n •Any injury resulting from improper use of the Application.\n •Any inaccuracies in self-assessments or posture detection.\n •Technical failures, data loss, or security breaches beyond reasonable control. > We reserve the right to update these Terms and Conditions. Users will be notified of significant changes through the Application or email.
We may suspend or terminate your access to WorkWell if:\n •You violate these Terms and Conditions.\n •You misuse the Application or engage in fraudulent activities.
